title: Over-sea;
author: Morford, Henry
snippet: And I might almost be disposed to trade my title deeds on Washington Heights or Beacon Hill (when I have any I) for a residence along Kelvin-Grove Park Terrace ; but that (as Pierce Egan might say, if he thought of it I) " the trail of the serpent is over us all," and Pritchard the murderer had left behind him the aroma of a former residence on that very Park Terrace, and the woollen-mills had made Kelvin Water  of something like the color and smell of a dye-pot I

title: Kriegspiel: the War-Game. [A novel.]
author: Groome, Francis Hindes
snippet: " Now, then," said an inspector, who was seated at adesk, "what's the charge?—assault to the effusion ofblood. Blood enough," he added, surveying the student,whose name (Arthur Cranston) and address (14 ArgyllPark Terrace) he proceeded to enter in a book. " Andyours?" to Sagul, "what's your name, and who are youstopping with?"
